Translations.Text: bamjung-eneun geubun-eul wihae buboghago bam-ui olaen sigan-e geubun-eul chan-yanghala
sillo ideul-eun hyeonseleul salanghamyeo mugeoun nal-eul dwilo naebeolyeodudeola
sillo naega geudeul-eul changjohayeossgo geudeul-ui golgyeog-eul ganghage hayeossnola. naega wonhaessdamyeon geudeulgwa yusahan jadeullo jeongnyeonghi (geudeul-eul) daechehaess-eul geos-ila
sillo igeos-eun tteoollim-ila. geuleoni wonhaneun janeun geuui junimkkelo hyanghaneun gil-eul jab-eula
geudaedeul-i wonham-eun ojig hananimkkeseo wonhasigi ttaemun-ila. sillo hananimkkeseoneun asineun bun-imyeo jihyelousin bun-idoda
geubunkkeseoneun wonhasineun jaleul dangsin-ui jabi sog-e deulge hasinola. geuligo budanghan jadeul, geudeul-eul wihae geubunkkeseoneun gotongseuleon beol-eul junbihasyeossnola
malgalgicheoleom mol-achineun balam-eul dugo maengseko
maenglyeolhi buneun geosen balam-eul dugo maengseko
guleum-eul peotteulineun balam-eul dugo maengseko
jinlileul bunbyeolhaneun cheonsaleul dugo maengseko
mesijileul gyesihaneun cheonsaleul dugo maengseko
(geu mesijineun) byeonlon-igeona gyeong-goloseo
jinsillo geudaedeul-i yagsogbad-eun geos-eun dagchyeool geos-ila
geuleoni byeoldeul-ui bich-i jiwojigo
haneul-i gallajigo
san-i ppobhyeo nagago
sadodeul-i jijeongdoen sigan-e moil ttae
geudeul-ui gihan-eun eotteon nal-eul wihae jijeongdoen geos-inga
bunliui nal-eul wihaeseola
mueos-i geudaeege bunliui nal-i mueos-injileul allyeo jul geos-inga
geunal jinlileul bujeonghaneun jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ila
naega ijeon salamdeul-eul pamyeolsikiji anh-assdeonga
geu hu naneun ihu salamdeul-i geudeul-eul dwittaleudolog hayeossnola
geuleohge naneun aghaeng-eul jeojileuneun jadeul-eul dalunola
geunal jinlileul bujeonghaneun jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ila
